divs: Sighting DetailsWas out playing frisbee with my dog when I saw an object heading North catch the sunlight for a few seconds. The object had no vapor trail and no sound and was moving about the speed of small plane. I watched it for a couple minutes when suddenly it disappeared. Felt like it could "hear" my thoughts
trends: There have been 41 other sightings in Fort Wayne
There were no other sightings in Fort Wayne on or around February 13th 2009
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
Summary: Metallic circular object catches sun light then disappears.
